original_text: From now on, because of me, five people in a family will be against each other. Two people will be against the other three. Three of them will be against the other two.
korean_text: 이후부터 한 집에 다섯 사람이 있어 분쟁하되 셋이 둘과, 둘이 셋과 하리니

sentences.original_text: five people in a family will be against each other
sentences.korean_translation: 한 가족의 다섯 사람이 서로 대적할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: Two people will be against the other three
sentences.korean_translation: 두 사람은 다른 세 사람을 대적할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: Three of them will be against the other two
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 중 세 사람은 다른 두 사람을 대적할 것입니다
